Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service

Interface SearchService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SearchServiceImpl
public interface SearchService
Runs various searches across the underlying database

  • Method Details

    • search

      SearchResult search(SearchQuery sq)
      Runs a search against STEP
      Parameters:
      sq - the query to be run, possibly containing multiple versions or even refined searches
      Returns:
      the search results

    • estimateSearch

      long estimateSearch(SearchQuery sq)
      Estimates the number of results returned by the search
      Parameters:
      sq - the query
      Returns:
      the search results

    • runQuery

      AbstractComplexSearch runQuery(List<SearchToken> searchTokens, String options, String display, int pageNumber, String filter, String sort, int context, String originalItems, String userLanguage)
      Runs the appropriate search for the given list of search tokens
      Parameters:
      searchTokens - the tokens
      sort - the type of sort
      context - the number of extra verses to lookup for each verse
      display - the type of display mode, e.g. interlinear, interleaved, etc.
      pageNumber - the page number to retrieve
      filter - the filter to apply (or blank to retrieve just the particular search query.
      options - the options ticked by the user
      originalItems - the original query as given by the user
      userLanguage - the user language in the browser (e.g.: en, zh, es, ...)
      Returns:
      the results from the search/passage lookup
